channel.title: Electro House/Dubstep need someone to collaborate with!
channel.description:
Hey! I’m currently working on a fast-ish (142 bpm) Drumstep, dubstep-ish track and I really need to work with someone who has done this type or anything similar to this before!
[Here’s the song](https://soundcloud.app.goo.gl/5DWynLGV8JCqg2P1A) it’s just one minute long because it only has the drop.
Lookin forward to working with you!
Edit: [Updated song ](https://soundcloud.app.goo.gl/AxUjXftBor791hTV9)

item.title: Electro House/Dubstep need someone to collaborate with!
item.dc:creator: KirkLurkPU
item.description:
Don’t make yourself walk on eggshells because honestly I’m open to constructive criticism as long as it has a point. I’ve only grasped the general rules of Electro House and in my opinion I shouldn’t stray too far away from the main theme, because Electro House Music are danced to by people. The Drum pattern is already catchy, but it’s okay if you change it because at the end of the day, it’s your song and it’s supposed to express your creativity, not mine. Your song is nice, and thanks for appreciating my attempt l

Read full topic
item.source: Electro House/Dubstep need someone to collaborate with!

item.title: Electro House/Dubstep need someone to collaborate with!
item.dc:creator: Haxerist
item.description:
Hey Kirk! I gave yours a shot and honestly, it sounds very different compared to my drop, like as soon as my drop hits, it’s like you’re hearing another song. Also you used my chord progression for the intro and it gets very repetitive, and counting the drop too, it gets more repetitive. I hope you don’t feel bad, I’m not trying to be mean.

Read full topic

item.title: Electro House/Dubstep need someone to collaborate with!
item.dc:creator: KirkLurkPU
item.description:
[Link Closed]

The Tonic chord was Bmin7, and just uses leading tone every end of 2 bars.
It was fun making, I only added “Sweet Saw” instrument so the intro feels fuller. The Bridge was short, but kind of effective.

Edit : let me just resend it, I only made a few tweaks
Haxerist - Advent ( with Intro and Bridge )

Read full topic
